Key Match Events: Wanindu Hasaranga was named Player of the Match for his all-round performance, taking 3 wickets for 21 runs and making 2 catches.
Pathum Nissanka scored an unbeaten 55 off 48 balls, leading Sri Lanka to victory.
Pramod Madushan made his T20I debut in this match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka won the match by 5 wickets with 18 balls remaining.
Sri Lanka elected to field first after winning the toss.
